typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cliente_id as integer,
		loja_id as integer,
		primeiro_nome as string,
		ultimo_nome as string,
		email as string,
		endereco_id as integer,
		ativo as integer,
		data_criacao as timestamp,
		ultima_atualizacao as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> cliente
source(output(
		aluguel_id as integer,
		data_de_aluguel as timestamp,
		inventario_id as integer,
		cliente_id as integer,
		data_de_devolucao as timestamp,
		funcionario_id as integer,
		ultima_atualizacao as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> aluguel
cliente, aluguel join(cliente@cliente_id == aluguel@cliente_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
